Description:
A Great Start or a Great Investment...
If you're looking to increase your investment portfolio with a great return of $18,200 per annum, or looking to purchase your first home, then look no further than this 3 bedroom property nestled on a 687m2 allotment.
A generous sized home with master including built-in robe, central bathroom, open kitchen, dining/living area and the kitchen flowing out to a large secure rear yard with double garage and plenty of space for the kids to play. Situated within walking distance to shopping centres, public transport, Sth Geelong train station for easy access to Melbourne. Add to this potential for subdivision all subject to council approval (STCA). A must inspection.
Insights: 17 Olney Avenue, Thomson VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 21 other 3 bedroom house in Thomson have recently been sold.

Description:
Newcomb Beauty
This well cared for home would suit a first home buyer/downsizer or investor. Conveniently located within walking distance to schools, shops and only a short drive to the Geelong CBD. Consisting of three good size bedrooms or two bedrooms and two living areas (including a large lounge), central kitchen, laundry and bathroom. Outside there is a good size backyard, outdoor entertaining area ideal when family and friends come over, roller door to garaging and off street parking. This is a great opportunity to live in a central location, don't miss it.

Description:
Scenic Hilltop Retreat 19.59ha 48.4 acres approx
Elevated in a private & tranquil locale overlooking the rolling Barrabool Hills, this superbly positioned 52 acre lot (approx.) and family home offers single level living with expansive valley views on the border of the tightly held countryside of Barrabool and Ceres.
Owned by the same family for over 40 years, the homestead comprises of 3 bedrooms (ensuite to main), 2 bathrooms (family with sep bath & shower), kitchen with stunning views plus great bench & cupboard space (incl. elec appliances), sep meals area, a large family lounge with combustion wood fire & cooling unit, study nook, mud room, sep laundry, underfloor elec slab heating (zoned per room) plus a double garage.
The home effortlessly takes advantage of its stunning elevated position with multiple alfresco spaces perfect for warm summer evenings, and has been carefully designed to maximise the surrounding established gardens, veggie patches and a tranquil leafy BBQ / entertaining space.
Providing a perfect blend of semi-rural living, including the option to renovate/re-build to further capitalise on the hilltop views, this highly desirable property is ideally suited to mixed farming, cropping, sheep, cattle or horses and offers the chance to acquire a superb lifestyle retreat or productive investment property.
Presenting as one main paddock (incl. cattle grid) and house lot, the property includes a lovely winding creek, established trees, two main dams, four bay machinery shed, garden shed, extra garden utility storage units with basins/water supply, a one stand shearing shed with an adjoining work/tool shop with mezzanine floor, two 75,000L (approx.) underground water tanks, two 25 000L poly tanks and septic sewerage.
Perfectly positioned in such a tightly held area this property will be hard to pass on, with easy access to Highton Village, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, prestigious Geelong schools, Geelong CBD, Surf Coast and the Melbourne CBD via the nearby Ring Road.
Insights: 70 Walter Road, Barrabool VIC 3221 was last sold in 2019.

Potential Plus in Blue Chip Location
This original home is located in one of East Geelongs most highly after sought streets. Only a stones throw from the Botanical gardens, Garden Street shops, Geelong CBD and the waterfront this property will appeal to renovators and or those looking to build a new home (STCA). On approximately 332m2 of prime East Geelong land with side access from the laneway create your dream home in the dream location. Act quick as opportunities like these are few and far between.

Address: 34 Enfield Drive St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Calling all first home buyers, growing families and Investors
This is an immaculate fully renovated home positioned in the heart of St Albans Park situated on a corner block with the potential (STCA) to further develop or build the ideal garage/shed.
The property is light and bright, freshly painted with new kitchen, bathroom and floor coverings throughout .The open plan living which flows to the kitchen/dining continues to the generously sized outdoor undercover paved alfresco area.
The new kitchen with stone benchtops, Omega stainless steel appliances, D/W, butler's pantry, plenty of bench space and storage.
Four bedrooms or three with and extra living area, are complimented by a neat bathroom with toilet and a further separate toilet. The functional laundry is ideal for a busy home.
Heating and cooling is accounted for with 2 x split systems.
Conveniently located only ten minutes to the Geelong CBD, minutes to local shops and public transport, this location is sure to appeal.
• 569m2
• Undercover Alfresco
• 2 x Split Systems
• 10 min to CBD
• Rent = $380pw
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 34 St Albans Road East Geelong VIC 3219
Description:
Great Location and Corner Allotment!
This compact home in revered East Geelong, not only boasts an ideal location, but also within walking distance to the East Boutique Shopping and Café precinct and the glorious Geelong Waterfront.
The home itself is situated on a corner allotment and has a land component of 447m2. Whether you chose to renovated or demolish and build or potential sub-division (STCA), the possibilities are endless. Displaying two large bedrooms, master with BIRs, a spacious central living area with fireplace, a sunlit study, U shaped kitchen, updated bathroom, separate toilet and rear sunroom.
With two street frontages and several million dollar plus properties being sold within a 500m radius, this really is an entry level price to get your foot into the East Geelong market.

Address: 13 Durran Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Unique investment or dual living opportunity.
What a unique opportunity to buy this 2 story, 4 bedroom home, that has been converted into two separate fully self-contained residences. Ideal for separate family living or a fantastic investment opportunity. Currently separately leased at $260 P/W for downstairs and $225 P/W for upstairs for a combined rental income of $485 P/W or $25,220 p.a. Live in 1 half and rent out the other. The downstairs residence comprises of 2 good sized bedrooms, master with ensuite, 2 living areas, an updated kitchen complete with plenty of bench space, S/S oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Central bathroom with bath, separate shower and vanity, good sized laundry and separate W/C. With polished timber floors throughout and dado wall panelling. Complete with gas heating and air conditioning and a privately fenced front yard and garage space.
Upstairs has its own private rear property access leading up to the decking with views across the suburb with a north facing entrance leading into the L shaped living/dining area with split system heating and cooling, 2 good sized bedrooms, both with built in robes and a good sized functional kitchen with gas upright stove, laundry/bathroom and separate w/c, good sized rear yard and garage space. All this on a 623m2 (approx.) allotment. What a great investment opportunity or a unique living opportunity and only 10 minutes away from Geelong's CBD and waterfront.

Description:
Immaculate Presentation In A Central Location!
Simply sit back, unpack and the hardest decision youll have to make here is where to put your furniture. Nicely situated at the back of only 3 townhouses on the block this beautifully presented property is an ideal first foray into the market, solid downsizer for those looking to simplify their lives or as a Set and forget rental property that will bring a fantastic return in an area that is becoming one of the most popular in Geelong.
Upon entry the light and inviting open plan living, dining and kitchen area that greets you conveys a feeling of warmth and leads directly to the private deck and entertaining area that has been set up for low maintenance living at its very best. The stylish kitchen is equipped with sensational stainless steel appliances including electric oven, gas cook top, range hood and dishwasher plus a plethora of storage and bench space; ideal for those that need that extra space when cooking!
Notable extras include high quality carpets, tiling, fixtures and fittings right throughout the townhouse, reverse cycle heating and cooling in the living room, stylish blinds and built in robes in both impressive bedrooms.
Public transport is located close by and this will take you to the CBD which is only a 15 minute ride from your front door or 10 minutes and youre across the Breakwater bridge and making the most of all that the Belmont shopping precinct has to offer while there is also ample car accommodation available with a single carport and a garage that has been transformed into a multi-purpose room by the current owner.
Hard to find and always in high demand properties like this one dont come along very often and with Breakwater tipped to be the next big thing in real estate its no wonder why; make the time to view and plan for the future!
App. Rental $350 per week.
Insights: 3/51 Tucker Street, Breakwater VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 2 other 2 bedroom unit in Breakwater have recently been sold.

Description:
Great family home.
Nestled in a quite court location is this lovely 3 bedroom family home on a huge 727m2 (approx.) allotment. You will be impressed with the recently updated fully appointed kitchen complete with dishwasher, gas cooktop & wall oven facing out into the north facing backyard. Lounge with wood heater, gas wall furnace, air conditioning, ceiling fan and ducted evaporative cooling throughout the home. The 3 good sized bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, all have ceiling fans and a central bathroom. The home has been freshly painted and recarpeted to give it a freshen up. All the works been done for the new owners to simply move in and enjoy. Outdoors is a great family entertaining area with plenty of room for the kids to play in the secure backyard complete with sand pit, covered play or entertaining area, alfresco area good sized garage and carport. All this located just minutes from Newcomb Central and Bellarine shopping centres, schools, public transport and less than 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and waterfront.

Address: 23 Westmoreland Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
First Home Owners or Astute Investors Take Note
In the ever popular and convenient suburb of St Albans Park is this well maintained 3 bedroom home perfect for the first homeowner or the astute investor. All 3 bedrooms complete with built-in robes. Updated open plan kitchen, dining, living area complete with plenty of cupboard space, gas cook top and electric oven, all overlooking the large manicured backyard. Central bathroom, separate shower and spa bath. The second living room is perfect for entertaining with built-in bar and added to this is the perfect north facing sitting room to relax and read your book in peace. The backyard is also ideal for entertaining with a large outdoor alfresco area for all to enjoy with the built-in BBQ for the perfect summer evening. Also ducted heating, 2 x reverse cycle air conditioning and also the convenience of what the suburb has to offer, with primary & secondary schools within walking distance, 2 x shopping centres, public transport, 5 mins from Geelong CBD, and minutes from the South Geelong train station. A must inspection.

Address: 62 St Albans Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
This character home is a gem.
When it comes to a home with character this is a gem. Conveniently located with 2 street frontages and on a generous 679m2 (approx.) allotment this property has a lot to offer. You will be impressed with the charm of the home with a renovated kitchen complete with dishwasher, large lounge room and dining area, study, large master bedroom and a timber lined 2nd bedroom with WIR, renovated bathroom and with polished floor boards throughout the home. Outdoors is a covered decking entertainment area and separate laundry/utility room, rumpus room or studio, workshop and a carport with remote control gate with access to the rear of the property into Collins Street. Huge front and rear yards for the avid gardener or plenty of room to store the boat or caravan. Great opportunity for first home buyer, renovators or investors alike and located just 10 minutes from Geelong CBD and waterfront, South Geelong railway station and Newcomb & Bellarine Shopping Centres.

Address: 1-3/30 Westmoreland Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
PERFECT ENTRY LEVEL INVESTMENT BUYING FOR THE SUPERANNUATION FUND
Block of three units all on the same title are the perfect opportunity to buy an investment that will care for itself. Consisting of a two bedroom unit at the front at $250 per week, Unit 2 and Unit 3 are one bedrooms returning $185.00 and $210.00 per week respectively, an annual return of $33,540.00. Low maintenance complex with simple gardens to maintain and each unit has access to a carport. No body Corporate fees and situated on an allotment of 616M2. Quiet location with access to public transport and convenience to Newcomb and CBD shopping. Blocks of units are becoming a scarcity in today's market so don't spend too much time considering as these returns are far greater than bank interest.

Description:
CORNER OPPORTUNITY IN GROWING NEWCOMB
This solid brick, 3 bedroom, 1 bath, SLUG home set on a corner 585m2 block approx and is ready to be transformed. Set in a convenient location on a quiet street this home would suit an array of buyers from FHB, a growing family with room to extend or a savvy investor with a potential rent pw of approx $330.
Comprising of neat entry, you will find a spacious front living room equipped with Rinnai gas log heater which is serviced every year and large windows that let in a flood of natural light. Off the living room you will find a separate informal meals area easily seating 6-8 and is equipped with Mitsubishi split system for all year round comfort. The functional kitchen offers 4 burner gas cooktop and gas oven plus ample storage.
Down the hall you will find 3 good sized bedrooms, all with BIW's and garden outlooks.
The central bathroom is neat and offers separate shower and compact sunken bath.
Outside presents a good sized back yard with a low maintenance garden perfect for children or your 4 legged friend, plus an oversized single lock up garage for all your storage needs.
This solid property boasting an array of options is ideally located 5 minutes walk to local shops, less than 2km from Geelong CBD and 15 minutes drive to the Bellarine coastline.

Rent pw $330 approx

Address: 64 St Albans Street St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
Invest, nest or develop.
Here is a unique opportunity to buy a 4 bedroom property with two street frontages. Buy this property alone or the neighbouring property, next door, at # 62 , is available for purchase as well. Both properties go through from St Albans Street to Collins Street. The rear of the properties gives potential to subdivide or develop (STCA) each being on a 665m2 (approx.) allotment.
This much loved family home has 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas or rumpus room, kitchen /meals, central bathroom, large laundry and plenty of potential to reinvigorate the home. With gas wall furnace heating and split system heating and cooling in the lounge, polished timber floors in the lounge and hallway and carpet throughout the rest of the home. The outdoor garden area and huge rear yard are great places to relax and with plenty of room for storage for the boat or caravan and a single garage with entrance from the rear street access. The opportunities are here for first home buyers, renovators, investors and developers alike. Located just 10 minutes from Geelong CBD and waterfront, South Geelong railway station and Newcomb & Bellarine shopping centres.

Description:
Calling All Buyers Potential Plus!
You will need to act fast and get in early to secure this home that is ideal for all buyers, especially first home, investors, renovators and developers alike.
Set on a very generous allotment of 716m2 approx. in a great Breakwater pocket surrounded by established homes sits this lovingly maintained single level home with 3 bedrooms which are serviced by a central family bathroom. Separate lounge room and dining/meals area adjacent to the sunny and recently updated kitchen complete with new benchtops, cupboards and electric cooktop & oven.
For all year round comfort there is gas heating & air conditioning in the lounge. And for those buyers looking for that all important outdoor space, out back there is a large family & pet friendly backyard and well maintained back garden complete with a single lock up garage This home represents outstanding value in a hot Breakwater property market currently. Close to Shopping, public transport and 10 minutes from the Geelong CBD & Waterfront. This is sure to be snapped up fast, dont miss your chance and enquire today.

Address: 2/158-162 Townsend Road St Albans Park VIC 3219
Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT
Perfectly positioned in a quiet complex, this charming two-bedroom home is newly restored whilst retaining its original features. Offering an open plan living room with study nook, central functional kitchen, adjacent meals area and newly finished with neutral carpet throughout. The good sized bedrooms feature built in robes and are accommodated by a central family bathroom and separate toilet.
Outdoor there is a great entertaining area leading to a very well maintained, low maintenance back garden with an additional private courtyard area. Other features include split system heating & cooling, high pitched ceilings throughout, a single lock up garage and additional car parking space.
This home represents outstanding value in the appealing suburb of St Albans Park and within close proximity to all amenities including public transport, schools, shopping centres, sporting facilities and only a short drive to the Geelong CBD and waterfront precinct. Dont miss your chance and enquire today.

Description:
Delightfully different in sought after location
Full of character and charm, this delightful single level home, will impress from the moment you walk through the front gate. The beautiful garden has been lovingly created and cared for, while the stunning residence has been meticulously renovated and is set to impress.
Offering three bedrooms including master suite with walk through robe and a lovely light filled ensuite. A stunning family bathroom, large laundry and a second living room with open fire offers an inviting room to relax. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area is filled with natural light and opens out through bi-fold and French doors to the entertaining spaces. The kitchen is filled with light and has beautiful concrete benches, great storage and quality Bosch appliances. Ducted heating and evaporative throughout plus open fireplace.
With a choice of two entertainment areas, including a large alfresco deck and a private paved area with pizza oven. If gardens are important, you will appreciate the effort and abundance of mature plants and trees throughout. Water tanks x 3 and garden shed.
Easy rear access into the oversized double garage plus further secure parking behind second roller door from lane.
Walking distance to Geelongs CBD, Garden Street shopping precinct, Geelong High School, our stunning waterfront and only meters from the beautiful Eastern Park and Botanic Gardens. This is a beautiful and quirky home offering a wonderful lifestyle.
For more information on this property text '12 Meakin' to 0428 444 841
